mapper.select: select FROM_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000, '%Y') as year, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000, '%m') as month, count(*) as count from uc_article group by year, month

select * from uc_article
1 = 1
and category_id=#{categoryId}
and id in (select article_id from uc_article_tag where tag_id=#{tagId})
and (From_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000,'%Y') = #{year} and From_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000,'%m') = #{month})
order by weight desc, create_date desc
